title: Getting in Syncro with Avo’s Scott Kolesaire
itunes:title: Getting in Syncro with Avo’s Scott Kolesaire
description:
This week we welcome Scott Kolesaire; the brand manager for Avo and Zino via remote. We’ll sit down and talk with Scott about the rebranding, Syncro and the upcoming 90th birthday of the man himself Avo Uvezian.

All this and the usual shenanigans known as The Cigar Authority.
content:encoded:
